text: 5. Other forms of war damage payment made by the Commission are highway payments, clearance payments (for clearing remains of structures from total loss sites) and church payments. Although differing in certain important ways from the ordinary cost of works payments, the sums paid under these heads have the common feature that they are all payments in respect of works which have been carried out.
handwritten_text: 5. Other forms of war damage payment made by the Commission are highway payments, clearance payments (for clearing remains of structures from total loss sites) and church payments. Although differing in certain important ways from the ordinary cost of works payments, the sums paid under these heads have the common feature that they are all payments in respect of works which have been carried out.
